txt.en: You have defeated many half-orcs at Taerhad.
Half-orcs can be found at Taerhad in Yondershire.\n\nWhile exploring the Yondershire, you have encountered a company of hostile half-orcs at Taerhad. You should defeat half-orcs at Taerhad.

Although it seems that more of these cruel half-orcs are arriving from the south with each passing day, you have done much to hinder the half-orcs encamped at Taerhad and protect the inhabitants of the Yondershire.
Half-orcs loyal to the mysterious Sharkey have seized the ruins of Taerhad, threatening the folk of Long Cleeve.

While exploring the Yondershire, you have encountered a company of hostile half-orcs at Taerhad. It appears they have already begun to pillage the surrounding lands and settlements on behalf of their mysterious leader, Sharkey, and unless they are driven off, they may soon threaten all the folk of the Yondershire.\n\nYou should defeat half-orcs at Taerhad.
